---

This is more efficient than individual activity posts when recording multiple related updates, such as importing conversation history or logging a series of actions taken during troubleshooting."

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add batch of activities to ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/activities/new-batch"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Logs multiple activity entries (comments, updates, notes) to a ticket in a single request. This is more efficient than individual activity posts when recording multiple related updates, such as importing conversation history or logging a series of actions taken during troubleshooting.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Prepare activities: Build array of activity objects with type, content, and visibility settings
3. Batch post: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/new-batch](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-activity-batch) with activity array
4. View timeline: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) to confirm activities are recorded

**Query Parameters**: Set `sendActivityEmail=false` to suppress notifications for the batch (useful for imports or bulk operations).

**Request Body**: Array of activity objects, each specifying type, content, visibility, and optional attachments.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-activity) – Add single activity
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-timeline) – View activity history
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/activities/\{activityId\}/send-notification](/docs/api/tickets/send-ticket-activity-notification) – Send notification for activity

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"sendActivityEmail","in":"query","required":false,"description":"Whether to send notification emails for these activities.","schema":{"type":"boolean","default":true}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Represents an activity or comment on a ticket.","properties":{"TicketActivityId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the activity."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier.","nullable":true},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the activity was last modified."},"IsPublic":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity is visible to end users."},"IsDeleted":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the activity has been soft-deleted."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent ticket identifier."},"TicketSubject":{"type":"string","description":"Subject of the parent ticket.","nullable":true},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier who created the activity."},"OwnerDetails":{"type":"string","description":"Quick reference display name for the owner.","nullable":true},"ActivityItems":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of polymorphic items making up the activity content.","items":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":true,"description":"Polymorphic activity item. Fields vary by activity type."},"nullable":true},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Sort order index."},"Alignment":{"type":"string","description":"UI alignment preference.","nullable":true}},"title":"TicketActivity"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

Fields vary by activity type."},"nullable":true},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","description":"Sort order index."},"Alignment":{"type":"string","description":"UI alignment preference.","nullable":true}},"title":"TicketActivity"}}}}}}}
>
